name: Devils 'n Dragons Arcade (Demo)
description:
Free or Pay What You Like version.

Do not hesitate to make even a modest contribution, it encourages me and helps me to develop the game faster !

(If you played the game please give me your feedback here !)

This is a demo of the Graveyard of the undead level and an incomplete Dark Castle Level. Keyboard or Gamepad (A : Jump, X : Fire, Rt : Run or Long Jump).

Keyboar : zqsd; space to jump; ctrl run or long jump; alt fire; R to restart the game. F4 toggles fullscreen.
